scripts.stop-testnet: docker stop testnet_postgres_1 && docker stop testnet_graphql-engine_1
scripts.purge-testnet: docker rm testnet_postgres_1 && docker rm testnet_graphql-engine_1 && docker volume rm testnet_db-data
scripts.reset-testnet: docker stop testnet_postgres_1 && docker rm testnet_postgres_1 && docker volume rm testnet_db-data && docker-compose -p testnet -f docker-compose-local-testnet.yml up -d
